footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Xiao | Update Date: 09/28/2022 | Editor: ChrӨma#3489

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Winged-Spear__
Top of the line drip. In effect, it's a big stat stick for Xiao. The passive takes a few plunges to stack up.

__Staff of Homa__
Best in slot if you can keep him under 50% HP. That can be a big ask though, as he will need a good Shielder, and you may need to intentionally get hit once or twice to activate it initially. But even at 100% HP, Homa is just so good that it is about on par with other 5*s.

__Blackcliff Pole/Deathmatch__
About even, which one is better will depend on your CRIT Ratio.

__Lithic Spear__
Unless you're running Double Hydro Xiao, he will not be paired with many Liyue characters other than Zhongli. However, even with just 2 Liyue characters, the spear is about even with Blackcliff Pole/Deathmatch. An R3-5 4Liyue Lithic Spear is significantly better than PJWS and Staff of Homa. Practically it will not be that good, due to teamcomp restrictions.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Calamity Queller__
Great option, isn't far behind PJWS

__Vortex Vanquisher__
About even with PJWS if Shielded. So it basically requires Geo Daddy (Zhongli). Unshielded it is a bit worse than Calamity Queller. Falls off a bit if you use both Bennett and TTDS.

__Favonius Lance__
Not as good as other 4*s for Xiao's personal damage, but can help smooth out energy requirements for him and his team.
